arts.ttl: OGC Nice predicted XI v Auxerre: Bayer Leverkusen target Jonathan Clauss out
arts.sum: Linked with a move away from OGC Nice, Jonathan Clauss will not play any part against AJ Auxerre on Saturday night. Clauss was absent from Thursday’s training session, attended by Get French…

arts.ttl: Nice vs Auxerre - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Ligue 1 clash between Nice and Auxerre, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
